title: Pharmaceutical and Biomedical Analysis
description: This course is designed for those interested in advanced methods for pharmaceutical analysis, diagnosis, therapy, anatomical and functional studies, drug monitoring, drug discovery, research and development. The principles, pharmaceutical and biomedical applications of the following topics will be discussed: mass spectrometry (MS), analytical method validation, sample preparations, magnetic resonance spectroscopy (MRS), magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) and other bioimaging methods etc. At the end of the course, the students will be able to appreciate and understand the many different techniques and options available to them for analysis, diagnosis, therapy, anatomical and functional studies, drug monitoring, drug discovery, research & development.
